title: Liam Payne, 26, enjoys date night with girlfriend Maya Henry, 19
text:
He recently gushed about his new relationship with Maya Henry, claiming she's 'brought back my happiness and helped through the stress'.

And Liam Payne and his model girlfriend looked every inch the cosy couple as they left Nobu in Mayfair on Wednesday after enjoying a date night.

The former One Direction star, 26, cut a casual figure in a black t-shirt and matching skinny jeans which he paired with white trainers.

Date: Liam Payne, 26, and his model girlfriend Maya Henry, 19, looked every inch the cosy couple as they left Nobu in Mayfair on Wednesday after enjoying a date night

Maya, 19, looked nothing short of sensational in a black leather coat with a matching top and light blue jeans.

She added height to her frame with a pair of black boots and also carried a black handbag.

Styling her brunette locks into an updo, the American model completed her look with a silver necklace.

While Liam and ex Cheryl are said to be on amicable terms, the hunk didn't hold back from admitting that he feels more 'relaxed' with social media sensation Maya.

Style: The former One Direction star, 26, cut a casual figure in a black t-shirt and matching skinny jeans which he paired with white trainers

The media personality enthused: 'She's awesome. It's got to the point with my life where I'm like, screw this - it's not worth my happiness. The different with her is she's so relaxed that it helps me relax in a situation.'

Singers Liam and Cheryl dated between February 2016 and July last year, in which they welcomed their first child Bear in March 2017.

The exes are currently co-parenting their son, but the For You singer confessed he finds it 'hard to control' how much Bear is spoilt by their extended family.

Honest: While Liam and ex Cheryl are said to be on amicable terms, the hunk didn't hold back from admitting that he feels more 'relaxed' with Maya (pictured in September 2019)

He explained to OK! magazine: 'They buy him stuff all the time. I can’t really say: "Don’t buy him stuff." But we were actually talking about it recently, because he has so many toys in the house and I’m like, "I will literally get him one toy". Because he doesn’t need loads, he’s got loads.

'It’s a bit ludicrous really but I can’t help the fact that people love him and they want to spoil him. I just think as he gets older I’m going to have to teach him the value of what it is.'

Liam led a completely different life than his toddler as he revealed his family struggled financially and resided in a 'very small house'.
description: The singer and the model looked every inch the cosy couple as they left Nobu in Mayfair on Wednesday after enjoying a date night.
